issue.title: [R] Handle empty or NULL transmute() args properly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11880](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11880). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following examples should all return results with zero columns. Check that this behavior is consistent across Tables, RecordBatches, and Datasets. There are some cases currently where these examples return all columns or throw errors.
 \* `transmute()`
 \* `transmute(NULL)`
 \* `transmute(x = NULL, y = NULL, z = NULL)`
 \* `x = NULL`
 `transmute(x = !!x)`
